svg.source:
Note over Portal_BE: User selects
 "deploy to k8s"
Portal_BE->Deployment
Client: POST /deploy 
{solutionId, revisionId,
 envId, userId}
Deployment
Client->Jenkins: Start Jenkins job with parameter taskId
Jenkins->Deployment
Client: Job created
Deployment
Client->CDS: POST /task {solId, revId, "taskCode": "DP",
 "statusCode": "IP", ...}
Deployment
Client->Portal_BE: 202 Accepted
 {taskId}
Note over Portal_BE: Monitor task/stepresult
 and update UI as needed
Note over Jenkins: Jenkins jobs are preconfigured
 (simple, composite,
 pipeline) in configmap
Note over Jenkins: Execute deployment script
Jenkins->Deployment
Client: POST /status/<taskId> {"status": "in-progress"}
Deployment
Client->CDS: PUT /task/<taskId> {"statusCode": "IP", ...}
Deployment
Client->CDS: POST /task/stepresult {taskId, "name": "DEP",
 "statusCode": "IP", ...}
Jenkins->Deployment
Client: GET /getSolutionZip/taskId
Deployment
Client->Jenkins: 202 OK (solution.zip)
Jenkins->k8s_Master: Create solution deployment
Note over Jenkins: Monitor progress
Jenkins->Deployment
Client: POST /status/<taskId>
 {"status": "complete", "ingress": "<url>"}
Deployment
Client->CDS: POST /task/stepresult {taskId, "name": "DEP",
 "statusCode": "SU", ...}
Deployment
Client->CDS: PUT /task/<taskId> {"statusCode": "SU", ...}
Deployment
Client->CDS: POST /notif
 {"message": "Deployment succeeded", "url": <url>, ...}

text.tspan: Start Jenkins job with parameter taskId
